block.title: Splunk for Cisco IPS
block.text:
Welcome to the Splunk for Cisco IPS Setup.
Use this setup screen to deploy and configure the Cisco IPS add-on into your Splunk deployment and configure a scripted input to collect the data from a Cisco IPS device in real-time. You can re-run this setup program at any time from the Splunk Manager to add additional data inputs for other Cisco IPS devices.

To remove an existing Cisco IPS input go to Manager/Data Inputs/Script.

input.label: Polling interval (in seconds). Enter 0 to poll continously.
